textAfterTable: How to find us Shepherd Neame Visitor Centre, 11 Court Street, Faversham, ME13 7AX Shop Opening Hours Mon - Sun 10:30 - 16:30 Brewery Ghost Tours Date: 27 October 2012 Times:  10:30 12:45 14:45 Cost: £12.50 Category: Special Events Take a guided evening tour of Britain's Oldest, and possibly most-haunted, Brewery. See how Shepherd Neame's award-winning ales and speciality lagers are brewed and discover a little of the strange sightings and unexplained happenings that have occurred on site. Shepherd Neame.
